text: Ndipo aliyense amene Mulungu wamutsogolera , atsogozedwa bwino koma iye amene Iye amusocheza wotere iwe siungamupezere mtetezi wina aliyense kupatula Iye yekha. Ndipo Ife tidzawasonkhanitsa onse pa tsiku la kuuka kwa akufa, akuyenda pa nkhope zawo, akhungu, abububu ndi agonthi, malo awo adzakhala Gahena ndipo pamene malawi ake azikazima tizidzawaonjezera moto
